caption.caption: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

connection.name: Value
connection.expression: If (NOT CurrentUserHasCode( A ) AND NOT CurrentUserHasCode( G ) AND NOT CurrentUserHasCode( O ) AND CurrentUserHasCode( N )) Then "Visualizador" Else If (NOT CurrentUserHasCode( A ) AND NOT CurrentUserHasCode( G )) Then "Operador" Else If (NOT CurrentUserHasCode( A ) AND CurrentUserHasCode( G )) Then "Supervisor" Else If CurrentUserHasCode( A ) Then "Administrador" Else ""

vbaItem.vbaCode:
Option Explicit
Private Declare Sub keybd_event Lib "user32" (ByVal bVk As Byte, ByVal bScan As Byte, ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Private Const KEYEVENTF_KEYUP = &H2 Private Const VK_SNAPSHOT = &H2C Private Const VK_MENU = &H12
Private Const PastaPrntScrn = "c:\printscreen\"
'Application Area Private Const ROOT_1 As String = "Topside"
'HMI Server ' sample area for HMI serverp ' sample HMI server name Private Const HMIAREANAME_1 As String = "" Private Const HMISERVERNAME_1 As String = "Topside"
'Data Server (includes Device-Based FTAE) ' sample area for OPC Data server ' default OPC Data server name Private Const DATAAREANAME_1 As String = "DSPCS" Private Const DATASERVERNAME_1 As String = "RSLinx Enterprise" Private Const DATAAREANAME_2 As String = "DSPSDFGS" Private Const DATASERVERNAME_2 As String = "RSLinx Enterprise" Private Const DATAAREANAME_3 As String = "DSPSDFGS2" Private Const DATASERVERNAME_3 As String = "RSLinx Enterprise" Private Const DATAAREANAME_4 As String = "DSPU" Private Const DATASERVERNAME_4 As String = "RSLinx Enterprise" Private Const DATAAREANAME_5 As String = "DSPU_OPC" Private Const DATASERVERNAME_5 As String = "Kepserver" Private Const DATAAREANAME_6 As String = "DSPU_OPC2" Private Const DATASERVERNAME_6 As String = "Kepserver"
'Tag-Based FTAE Server, if defined ' sample area for Tag-Based FTAE server ' sample Tag-Based FTAE server name Private Const FTAETAGAREANAME_1 As String = "FTAEPCS" Private Const FTAETAGSERVERNAME_1 As String = "FTAEPCS" Private Const FTAETAGAREANAME_2 As String = "FTAEPSDFGS" Private Const FTAETAGSERVERNAME_2 As String = "FTAEPSDFGS" Private Const FTAETAGAREANAME_3 As String = "FTAEPSDFGS2" Private Const FTAETAGSERVERNAME_3 As String = "FTAEPSDFGS2" Private Const FTAETAGAREANAME_4 As String = "FTAEPU" Private Const FTAETAGSERVERNAME_4 As String = "FTAEPU" Private Const FTAETAGAREANAME_5 As String = "FTAEPU2" Private Const FTAETAGSERVERNAME_5 As String = "FTAEPU2"
'Number of Servers Private Const NUMBEROFHMISERVERS = 1 Private Const NUMBEROFDATASERVERS = 6 Private Const NUMBEROFFTAETAGSERVERS = 5
'Total number is the number of your servers + 1 for the FactoryTalk Directory. ' For example: HMI Server, Data Server (RSLinx), Tag-Based A&E = 3 + 1 for txtPrimaryStatus1 ' Example total would be 4. Private Const NUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS = NUMBEROFHMISERVERS + NUMBEROFDATASERVERS + NUMBEROFFTAETAGSERVERS + 1
'Max number of servers our screen is configured for. Private Const MAXNUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS = NUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS
'Assignments of GRP constants used to display graphics ' GRP_x assignments correspond to the graphic. If you reorganize or ' want to reassign, you'll have to go through the code reassign everywhere.
' status-state indicator - txtPrimaryStatus1 Private Const GRP_1 = 1 ' status-state indicator - HMI Server 1 Private Const GRP_2 = 2 ' status-state indicator - Data Server 1 Private Const GRP_3 = 3 ' status-state indicator - Data Server 2 Private Const GRP_4 = 4 ' status-state indicator - Data Server 3 Private Const GRP_5 = 5 ' status-state indicator - Data Server 4 Private Const GRP_6 = 6 ' status-state indicator - Data Server 5 Private Const GRP_7 = 7 ' status-state indicator - Data Server 6 Private Const GRP_8 = 8 ' status-state indicator - FTAE Tag-Based 1 Private Const GRP_9 = 9 ' status-state indicator - FTAE Tag-Based 2 Private Const GRP_10 = 10 ' status-state indicator - FTAE Tag-Based 3 Private Const GRP_11 = 11 ' status-state indicator - FTAE Tag-Based 4 Private Const GRP_12 = 12 ' status-state indicator - FTAE Tag-Based 5 Private Const GRP_13 = 13
' default HMI area ' default HMI server Private sHMIAREANAME_1 As String Private sHMISvrName_1 As String
' default Data area ' default Data server Private sDATAreaName_1 As String Private sDATSvrName_1 As String Private sDATAreaName_2 As String Private sDATSvrName_2 As String Private sDATAreaName_3 As String Private sDATSvrName_3 As String Private sDATAreaName_4 As String Private sDATSvrName_4 As String Private sDATAreaName_5 As String Private sDATSvrName_5 As String Private sDATAreaName_6 As String Private sDATSvrName_6 As String
' default FTAE Area ' default FTAE Server Private sFTAETagAreaName_1 As String Private sFTAETagSvrName_1 As String Private sFTAETagAreaName_2 As String Private sFTAETagSvrName_2 As String Private sFTAETagAreaName_3 As String Private sFTAETagSvrName_3 As String Private sFTAETagAreaName_4 As String Private sFTAETagSvrName_4 As String Private sFTAETagAreaName_5 As String Private sFTAETagSvrName_5 As String
' adding 1 to array definition since all our indexing starts with 1 instead of 0. Private sAreaName(MAXNUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS + 1) As String Private sServername(MAXNUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS + 1) As String Private sFullServerName(MAXNUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS + 1) As String
Private WithEvents appStatus As Application 'app events used to update real time status Attribute appStatus.VB_VarHelpID = -1
Private sHMIArray(NUMBEROFHMISERVERS + 1) As String 'array to search multiple HMI servers + 1 b/c search starts at 1 Private sDATAArray(NUMBEROFDATASERVERS + 1) As String 'array to search multiple DATA servers + 1 b/c search starts at 1 Private sFTAETagArray(NUMBEROFFTAETAGSERVERS + 1) As String 'array to search multiple FTAE servers + 1 b/c search starts at 1
Dim WithEvents Server_status As TagGroup Attribute Server_status.VB_VarHelpID = -1
Dim TSFTDSVR_FTDirectory_sts As Tag Dim TSCSSVRA_hmi_sts As Tag Dim TSCSSVRA_data_sts As Tag Dim TSCSSVRA_ftae_sts As Tag Dim TSCSSVRB_hmi_sts As Tag Dim TSCSSVRB_data_sts As Tag Dim TSCSSVRB_ftae_sts As Tag Dim TSSDFGSSVRA_data_sts As Tag Dim TSSDFGSSVRA_ftae_sts As Tag Dim TSSDFGSSVRB_data_sts As Tag Dim TSSDFGSSVRB_ftae_sts As Tag Dim TSPCKSVRA_data_sts As Tag Dim TSPCKSVRA_ftae_sts As Tag Dim TSPCKSVRA_data_opc_sts As Tag Dim TSPCKSVRB_data_sts As Tag Dim TSPCKSVRB_ftae_sts As Tag Dim TSPCKSVRB_data_opc_sts As Tag
Private Sub Display_AnimationStart() Dim lGroup As Long On Error GoTo ErrHandler Set Server_status = Nothing Err.Clear
Set Server_status = Application.CreateTagGroup(Me.AreaName, 500)
'Tags do servidor FTD Server_status.Add "Server\TSFTDSVR\FTDirectory_sts"
'Tags do servidor de telas PCS-A Server_status.Add "Server\TSCSSVRA\data_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSCSSVRA\ftae_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSCSSVRA\hmi_sts"
'Tags do servidor de telas PCS-B Server_status.Add "Server\TSCSSVRB\data_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSCSSVRB\ftae_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSCSSVRB\hmi_sts"
'Tags do servidor de telas PSDFG-A Server_status.Add "Server\TSSDFGSSVRA\data_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSSDFGSSVRA\ftae_sts"
'Tags do servidor de telas PSDFG-B Server_status.Add "Server\TSSDFGSSVRB\data_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSSDFGSSVRB\ftae_sts"
'Tags do servidor de telas PU-A Server_status.Add "Server\TSPCKSVRA\data_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSPCKSVRA\data_OPC_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSPCKSVRA\ftae_sts"
'Tags do servidor de telas PU-B Server_status.Add "Server\TSPCKSVRB\data_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSPCKSVRB\data_OPC_sts" Server_status.Add "Server\TSPCKSVRB\ftae_sts"
Server_status.Active = True
Set TSFTDSVR_FTDirectory_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSFTDSVR\FTDirectory_sts")
Set TSCSSVRA_hmi_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSCSSVRA\hmi_sts") Set TSCSSVRA_data_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSCSSVRA\data_sts") Set TSCSSVRA_ftae_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSCSSVRA\ftae_sts")
Set TSCSSVRB_hmi_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSCSSVRB\hmi_sts") Set TSCSSVRB_data_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSCSSVRB\data_sts") Set TSCSSVRB_ftae_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSCSSVRB\ftae_sts")
Set TSSDFGSSVRA_data_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSSDFGSSVRA\data_sts") Set TSSDFGSSVRA_ftae_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSSDFGSSVRA\ftae_sts")
Set TSSDFGSSVRB_data_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSSDFGSSVRB\data_sts") Set TSSDFGSSVRB_ftae_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSSDFGSSVRB\ftae_sts")
Set TSPCKSVRA_data_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSPCKSVRA\data_sts") Set TSPCKSVRA_ftae_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSPCKSVRA\ftae_sts") Set TSPCKSVRA_data_opc_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSPCKSVRA\data_opc_sts")
Set TSPCKSVRB_data_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSPCKSVRB\data_sts") Set TSPCKSVRB_ftae_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSPCKSVRB\ftae_sts") Set TSPCKSVRB_data_opc_sts = Server_status.Item("Server\TSPCKSVRB\data_opc_sts")
'general initialization 'appStatus ServiceDisruption/ServiceRecovery events used to update real time status Set appStatus = Me.Application
'initialize for default servers sHMIAREANAME_1 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & HMIAREANAME_1 sHMISvrName_1 = HMISERVERNAME_1
sDATAreaName_1 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & DATAAREANAME_1 sDATSvrName_1 = DATASERVERNAME_1 sDATAreaName_2 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & DATAAREANAME_2 sDATSvrName_2 = DATASERVERNAME_2 sDATAreaName_3 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & DATAAREANAME_3 sDATSvrName_3 = DATASERVERNAME_3 sDATAreaName_4 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & DATAAREANAME_4 sDATSvrName_4 = DATASERVERNAME_4 sDATAreaName_5 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & DATAAREANAME_5 sDATSvrName_5 = DATASERVERNAME_5 sDATAreaName_6 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & DATAAREANAME_6 sDATSvrName_6 = DATASERVERNAME_6
sFTAETagAreaName_1 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & FTAETAGAREANAME_1 sFTAETagSvrName_1 = FTAETAGSERVERNAME_1 sFTAETagAreaName_2 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & FTAETAGAREANAME_2 sFTAETagSvrName_2 = FTAETAGSERVERNAME_2 sFTAETagAreaName_3 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & FTAETAGAREANAME_3 sFTAETagSvrName_3 = FTAETAGSERVERNAME_3 sFTAETagAreaName_4 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & FTAETAGAREANAME_4 sFTAETagSvrName_4 = FTAETAGSERVERNAME_4 sFTAETagAreaName_5 = "/" & ROOT_1 & "/" & FTAETAGAREANAME_5 sFTAETagSvrName_5 = FTAETAGSERVERNAME_5
'set default status for GRP_1 server: txtPrimaryStatus1 sAreaName(GRP_1) = "Not Applicable" sServername(GRP_1) = "FTDirectory" sFullServerName(GRP_1) = sServername(GRP_1)
'set default status for GRP_2 server: HMI Server 1 sAreaName(GRP_2) = sHMIAREANAME_1 sServername(GRP_2) = sHMISvrName_1 sFullServerName(GRP_2) = sAreaName(GRP_2) & ":" & sServername(GRP_2)
'set default status for GRP_3 server: Data Server 1 sAreaName(GRP_3) = sDATAreaName_1 sServername(GRP_3) = sDATSvrName_1 sFullServerName(GRP_3) = sAreaName(GRP_3) & ":" & sServername(GRP_3)
'set default status for GRP_4 server: Data Server 2 sAreaName(GRP_4) = sDATAreaName_2 sServername(GRP_4) = sDATSvrName_2 sFullServerName(GRP_4) = sAreaName(GRP_4) & ":" & sServername(GRP_4)
'set default status for GRP_5 server: Data Server 3 sAreaName(GRP_5) = sDATAreaName_3 sServername(GRP_5) = sDATSvrName_3 sFullServerName(GRP_5) = sAreaName(GRP_5) & ":" & sServername(GRP_5)
'set default status for GRP_6 server: Data Server 4 sAreaName(GRP_6) = sDATAreaName_4 sServername(GRP_6) = sDATSvrName_4 sFullServerName(GRP_6) = sAreaName(GRP_6) & ":" & sServername(GRP_6)
'set default status for GRP_7 server: Data Server 5 sAreaName(GRP_7) = sDATAreaName_5 sServername(GRP_7) = sDATSvrName_5 sFullServerName(GRP_7) = sAreaName(GRP_7) & ":" & sServername(GRP_7)
'set default status for GRP_8 server: Data Server 6 sAreaName(GRP_8) = sDATAreaName_6 sServername(GRP_8) = sDATSvrName_6 sFullServerName(GRP_8) = sAreaName(GRP_8) & ":" & sServername(GRP_8)
'set default status for GRP_8 server: FTAE Tag-Based 1 sAreaName(GRP_9) = sFTAETagAreaName_1 sServername(GRP_9) = sFTAETagSvrName_1 sFullServerName(GRP_9) = sAreaName(GRP_9) & ":" & sServername(GRP_9)
'set default status for GRP_9 server: FTAE Tag-Based 2 sAreaName(GRP_10) = sFTAETagAreaName_2 sServername(GRP_10) = sFTAETagSvrName_2 sFullServerName(GRP_10) = sAreaName(GRP_10) & ":" & sServername(GRP_10)
'set default status for GRP_10 server: FTAE Tag-Based 3 sAreaName(GRP_11) = sFTAETagAreaName_3 sServername(GRP_11) = sFTAETagSvrName_3 sFullServerName(GRP_11) = sAreaName(GRP_11) & ":" & sServername(GRP_11)
'set default status for GRP_11 server: FTAE Tag-Based 3 sAreaName(GRP_12) = sFTAETagAreaName_4 sServername(GRP_12) = sFTAETagSvrName_4 sFullServerName(GRP_12) = sAreaName(GRP_12) & ":" & sServername(GRP_12)
'set default status for GRP_12 server: FTAE Tag-Based 3 sAreaName(GRP_13) = sFTAETagAreaName_5 sServername(GRP_13) = sFTAETagSvrName_5 sFullServerName(GRP_13) = sAreaName(GRP_13) & ":" & sServername(GRP_13)
For lGroup = 1 To MAXNUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS ConfigServerStatus lGroup ConfigServerState lGroup Next
Exit Sub ErrHandler: LogDiagnosticsMessage "VBA Error (Display_AnimationStart()): " & Hex(Err.Number) & " - " & Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError End Sub
Private Sub appStatus_ServerStateChanged(ByVal Area As String, ByVal ServerName As String, ByVal ComputerName As String, ByVal State As gfxServerStateConstants) Dim lGroup As Long
For lGroup = 1 To NUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS ConfigServerState lGroup Next End Sub
Private Sub appStatus_ServiceDisruption(ByVal Area As String, ByVal ServerName As String, ByVal ComputerName As String) Dim lGroup As Long
For lGroup = 1 To NUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS ConfigServerStatus lGroup Next End Sub
Private Sub appStatus_ServiceRecovery(ByVal Area As String, ByVal ServerName As String, ByVal ComputerName As String) Dim lGroup As Long
For lGroup = 1 To NUMBEROFSERVERGROUPS ConfigServerStatus lGroup Next End Sub
Private Sub Display_BeforeAnimationStop() Set appStatus = Nothing Set Server_status = Nothing End Sub
Public Sub SetServerStatus(lGroup As Long, sscStatus As gfxServerStatusConstants, bPrimaryServer As Boolean) Dim sObjectName As String On Error GoTo ErrHandler
'determine whether primary or secondary If bPrimaryServer Then sObjectName = "txtPrimaryStatus" Else sObjectName = "txtSecondaryStatus" End If
'set status colour If sscStatus = gfxServerStatusActive Then Elements.Item(sObjectName & lGroup).BackColor = vbGreen
ElseIf sscStatus = gfxServerStatusStandby Then Elements.Item(sObjectName & lGroup).BackColor = vbYellow
ElseIf sscStatus = gfxServerStatusOutOfService Then Elements.Item(sObjectName & lGroup).BackColor = vbRed
Else Elements.Item(sObjectName & lGroup).BackColor = vbBlack
If sAreaName(lGroup) = "Not Applicable" Then Elements.Item(sObjectName & lGroup).Visible = False Else Elements.Item(sObjectName & lGroup).Visible = True End If
End If
Exit Sub ErrHandler: LogDiagnosticsMessage "VBA Error (SetServerStatus()): " & Hex(Err.Number) & " - " & Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError End Sub
Public Sub ConfigServerStatus(lGroup As Long) Dim strActiveComputerName As String Dim sscPrimaryStatus As gfxServerStatusConstants Dim sscSecondaryStatus As gfxServerStatusConstants On Error GoTo ErrHandler
'Display name of application txtApplicationName.Caption = Application.ApplicationName
'determining server status and name GetServerStatus sFullServerName(lGroup), sscPrimaryStatus, sscSecondaryStatus, strActiveComputerName
Elements.Item("txtAreaName" & lGroup).Caption = sAreaName(lGroup) If sAreaName(lGroup) = "Not Applicable" Then Elements.Item("txtAreaName" & lGroup).Visible = False Else Elements.Item("txtAreaName" & lGroup).Visible = True End If Elements.Item("txtServerName" & lGroup).Caption = sServername(lGroup) Elements.Item("txtComputerName" & lGroup).Caption = strActiveComputerName
SetServerStatus lGroup, sscPrimaryStatus, True SetServerStatus lGroup, sscSecondaryStatus, False
Exit Sub ErrHandler: Select Case Hex(Err.Number) Case 80040488 sscPrimaryStatus = gfxServerStatusOutOfService sscSecondaryStatus = gfxServerStatusSecondaryNotDefined strActiveComputerName = "Server NOT found!" Resume Next Case Else LogDiagnosticsMessage "VBA Error (ConfigServerStatus()): " & Hex(Err.Number) & " - " & Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError End Select End Sub
Public Sub ConfigServerState(lGroup As Long) Dim sscPrimaryState As gfxServerStateConstants Dim sscSecondaryState As gfxServerStateConstants On Error GoTo ErrHandler
GetServerState sFullServerName(lGroup), sscPrimaryState, sscSecondaryState
SetServerState lGroup, sscPrimaryState, True SetServerState lGroup, sscSecondaryState, False
Exit Sub ErrHandler: Select Case Hex(Err.Number) Case 80040490 sscPrimaryState = gfxServerStateNotLoaded sscSecondaryState = gfxServerStateSecondaryNotDefined Resume Next Case Else LogDiagnosticsMessage "VBA Error (ConfigServerState()): " & Hex(Err.Number) & " - " & Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError End Select End Sub
Public Sub SetServerState(lGroup As Long, sscState As gfxServerStateConstants, bPrimaryServer As Boolean)
Dim gray, rgbValue As Integer ' Return the value for red. gray = RGB(100, 100, 100)
Dim sObjectName As String Dim bFTServer As Boolean On Error GoTo ErrHandler
'determine whether primary or secondary If bPrimaryServer Then sObjectName = "txtPrimaryStatus" Else sObjectName = "txtSecondaryStatus" End If
'determine whether FTserver If StrComp(UCase(Elements.Item("txtServerName" & lGroup).Caption), "FTDIRECTORY", vbTextCompare) = 0 Then bFTServer = True Else bFTServer = False End If
With Elements.Item(sObjectName & lGroup) Select Case sscState Case gfxServerStateActive .ForeColor = vbYellow .ToolTipText = "Ativo"
Case gfxServerStateStandby .ForeColor = vbYellow .ToolTipText = "Standby"
Case gfxServerStateOutofService .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Fora de Servio - Falha"
Case gfxServerStateSecondaryNotDefined .ForeColor = vbWhite If bFTServer Then .ToolTipText = "No Aplicvel" Else .ToolTipText = "Secundrio No Definido" End If
Case gfxServerStateNotInUse .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Fora de Servio - Manual"
Case gfxServerStateStandbySync .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Standby - Sincronizando"
Case gfxServerStateActiveSync .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Ativo - Sincronizando"
Case gfxServerStateActiveNoPartner .ForeColor = vbYellow
If bFTServer Then Else .ToolTipText = "Ativo" End If .ToolTipText = "Ativo - Sem Parceiro"
Case gfxServerStateCommError .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Erro de Comunicao"
Case gfxServerStateLoading .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Servidor Carregando"
Case gfxServerStateStarting .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Servidor Iniciando"
Case gfxServerStateReady .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Ready"
Case gfxServerStateReadyToBeActive .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Pronto para ser o Ativo"
Case gfxServerStateReadyToBeStandby .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Pronto para ser o Standby"
Case gfxServerStateNotLoaded .ForeColor = gray .ToolTipText = "Servidor No Carregado"
Case Else .ForeColor = vbWhite .ToolTipText = "No Definido" End Select End With
Exit Sub ErrHandler: LogDiagnosticsMessage "VBA Error (SetServerState()): " & Hex(Err.Number) & " - " & Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError End Sub
Private Sub Server_Alarmes() On Error GoTo ErrHandler
TSFTDSVR_FTDirectory_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus1.ToolTipText
'Linhas Modificadas By Luis 28-11-2017 'TSCSSVRA_hmi_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus2.ToolTipText 'TSCSSVRA_data_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus3.ToolTipText 'TSCSSVRA_ftae_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus6.ToolTipText
'TSCSSVRB_hmi_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus2.ToolTipText 'TSCSSVRB_data_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus3.ToolTipText 'TSCSSVRB_ftae_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus6.ToolTipText
'TSSDFGSSVRA_data_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus4.ToolTipText 'TSSDFGSSVRA_ftae_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus7.ToolTipText
'TSSDFGSSVRB_data_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus4.ToolTipText 'TSSDFGSSVRB_ftae_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus7.ToolTipText
'TSPCKSVRA_data_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus5.ToolTipText 'TSPCKSVRA_ftae_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus8.ToolTipText 'TSPCKSVRA_data_opc_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus9.ToolTipText
'TSPCKSVRB_data_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus5.ToolTipText 'TSPCKSVRB_ftae_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus8.ToolTipText 'TSPCKSVRB_data_opc_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus9.ToolTipText
If TSCSSVRA_hmi_sts.Value <> txtPrimaryStatus2.ToolTipText Then TSCSSVRA_hmi_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus2.ToolTipText If TSCSSVRA_data_sts.Value <> txtPrimaryStatus3.ToolTipText Then TSCSSVRA_data_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus3.ToolTipText If TSCSSVRA_ftae_sts.Value <> txtPrimaryStatus6.ToolTipText Then TSCSSVRA_ftae_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus6.ToolTipText
If TSCSSVRB_hmi_sts.Value <> txtSecondaryStatus2.ToolTipText Then TSCSSVRB_hmi_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus2.ToolTipText If TSCSSVRB_data_sts.Value <> txtSecondaryStatus3.ToolTipText Then TSCSSVRB_data_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus3.ToolTipText If TSCSSVRB_ftae_sts.Value <> txtSecondaryStatus6.ToolTipText Then TSCSSVRB_ftae_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus6.ToolTipText
If TSSDFGSSVRA_data_sts.Value <> txtPrimaryStatus4.ToolTipText Then TSSDFGSSVRA_data_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus4.ToolTipText If TSSDFGSSVRA_ftae_sts.Value <> txtPrimaryStatus7.ToolTipText Then TSSDFGSSVRA_ftae_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus7.ToolTipText
If TSSDFGSSVRB_data_sts.Value <> txtSecondaryStatus4.ToolTipText Then TSSDFGSSVRB_data_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus4.ToolTipText If TSSDFGSSVRB_ftae_sts.Value <> txtSecondaryStatus7.ToolTipText Then TSSDFGSSVRB_ftae_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus7.ToolTipText
If TSPCKSVRA_data_sts.Value <> txtPrimaryStatus5.ToolTipText Then TSPCKSVRA_data_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus5.ToolTipText If TSPCKSVRA_ftae_sts.Value <> txtPrimaryStatus8.ToolTipText Then TSPCKSVRA_ftae_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus8.ToolTipText If TSPCKSVRA_data_opc_sts.Value <> txtPrimaryStatus9.ToolTipText Then TSPCKSVRA_data_opc_sts.Value = txtPrimaryStatus9.ToolTipText
If TSPCKSVRB_data_sts.Value <> txtSecondaryStatus5.ToolTipText Then TSPCKSVRB_data_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus5.ToolTipText If TSPCKSVRB_ftae_sts.Value <> txtSecondaryStatus8.ToolTipText Then TSPCKSVRB_ftae_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus8.ToolTipText If TSPCKSVRB_data_opc_sts.Value <> txtSecondaryStatus9.ToolTipText Then TSPCKSVRB_data_opc_sts.Value = txtSecondaryStatus9.ToolTipText
Exit Sub
ErrHandler: LogDiagnosticsMessage "VBA Error (Server_Alarmes()): " & Hex(Err.Number) & " - " & Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError End Sub
Private Sub pulso_Change() On Error GoTo ErrHandler If (pulso.Value = 10) Or (pulso.Value = 20) Or (pulso.Value = 30) Or (pulso.Value = 40) Or (pulso.Value = 50) Or (pulso.Value = 0) Then Server_Alarmes End If Exit Sub ErrHandler: End Sub
